header.title: Modern Engagement
header.description: Public participation in environmental assessments is critical, giving citizens input into decisions on whether or not major projects should proceed, and if they do, what safeguards should be in place.

banner.description: Description: Public participation in environmental assessments is critical, giving citizens input into decisions on whether or not major projects should proceed, and if they do, what safeguards should be in place.

review.ifThreatContact: If there is a threat/menace in the comments, check the box below. No email will be sent. Contact Sarah Plank at sarah.plank@gov.bc.ca
